name: SPEC_ANTI_MIT_ANTIBOD_DET
description: This table stores whether anti-mitochondrial antibodies were detected.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANTI_MITOCHON_ANTIBODY_DET_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for whether anti-mitochondrial antibodies were detected.
